data.title: High School Programs
data.meta_description: Find information on program opportunities for high school students. High school programs also allow high school students to take high school courses and college-level courses at the same time.
data.text:
At Alamo Colleges District, our five Alamo Colleges partner with local school districts and home school students to:

Offer you low-cost college courses while completing high school graduation requirements

Provide pathways for your education and career goals

Create supportive learning conditions as you manage a challenging curriculum

Ensure you have equal access to fully participate

View our partnership agreements.

Dual Credit

As a Dual Credit high school student, you would receive credit for college courses completed from your high school and one of our five Alamo Colleges.

ECHS and P-TECH

As an ECHS or P-TECH student, you would receive a high school diploma and an associate degree, certification, or up to 60 college-credit hours toward your bachelorâ€™s degree while still in high school.

Alamo Academies

As an Alamo Academies student, you would be exposed to STEM careers driven by industry and high-demand career pathways through a hands-on curriculum.
